mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_user_xref(team_id, user_id) SELECT #{teamId}, #{memberId} FROM dual WHERE NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM team_user_xref WHERE team_id = #{teamId} AND user_id = #{memberId})
mapper.update: UPDATE team SET name = #{name} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, name FROM team WHERE 1 = 1 AND id > 0
SELECT u.id AS uid, u.role, u.username, u.password FROM cockpit_user AS u JOIN team_user_xref AS xref ON u.id = xref.user_id WHERE xref.team_id = #{id}
